column3: Automatic sanity-testing: PASSED, see http://jenkins.bluematt.me/pull-tester/p4917_b941ee22cd83f59570d9ed52660a0dfa37046ed0/ for binaries and test log.\nThis test script verifies pulls every time they are updated. It, however, dies sometimes and fails to test properly.  If you are waiting on a test, please check timestamps to verify that the test.log is moving at http://jenkins.bluematt.me/pull-te
Not sure about this. Why prefer the one over the other? And if there is a clear preference, please put it in words instead of assuming people will make a decision based on the order of sections.\n

We've decided a few times now to drop the docs for macports, just never actually done it. Afaik nothing's changed here, so I'd prefer to just remove the references entirely.

@gavinandresen: that still what you would prefer?
ACK on dropping mention of MacPorts, brew seems to have won the package-manager-on-OSX war.\n
@rebroad Are you going to update this to completely remove mention of MacPorts?\n
